options.text: 5 m, 6.28 sec
5 m, 628 sec
5 m, 62.8 sec
5.25 m, 6.28 sec
5.5 m, 6.28 sec

data.explanation:
(a) ;  v = w\[\sqrt{A2-x2}\]

         3 = w\[\sqrt{A2-42}\] .............. (i) ; 4 = w\[\sqrt{A2-32}\] ................ (ii)

         \[\frac{(i)2}{(ii)2}\] ev,  \[\frac{9}{16}\] = \[\frac{A2-16}{A2-9}\] ev, 9A2 - 81 = 16A2 - 256

         ev, 7A2 = 175 ev, A2 = 25 ev, A = 5 m

         \  w = \[\frac{3}{\sqrt{52-42}}\] = \[\frac{3}{\sqrt{9}}\] = \[\frac{3}{3}\] = 1 rad s-1

            \ T = \[\frac{2\pi }{\omega }\] = 2ps = 6.28 s
data.correctAnswer: 5 m, 6.28 sec
